word:
From the light given me, I know that when Elder Franke hides self in Christ, when he is converted daily, he will be a successful laborer for God. And God will bless him as long as he works in the meekness and lowliness of 


                                   -231- 

Christ.--Letter 195, 1901, pp. 6-8. (To Brother and Sister Haskell, September 23, 1901.)
